app.title: Generate Lorem Ipsum
app.startWithClassic: Start with "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..."
app.quickCopyTooltip: Copies one Lorem Ipsum paragraph to your clipboard
app.howToTitle: How to use the Lorem Ipsum Generator
app.howToDesc1: Lorem Ipsum is a placeholder text commonly used in the printing and typesetting industry. It has been the industry's standard dummy text since the 16th century, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
app.howToDesc2: This generator allows you to create customized Lorem Ipsum text for your design and layout needs.
app.howToDesc3: To generate Lorem Ipsum text, follow these steps:
app.howToStep1: Select the desired number of paragraphs (from 1 to 10)
app.howToStep2: Choose whether to start with the classic phrase "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..."
app.howToStep3: Click the Generate button to create the text
app.howToStep4: Use the Copy button to copy the generated text to your clipboard
